column5: Register your interest in graduate study at University of KentÂ Do you aspire to be a strong, solution-focused leader in the healthcare industry?Contemporary healthcare management faces enormous challenges and requires leaders that provide effective management and oversight of healthcare organisations. Healthcare managers need sophisticated and refined leadership, strong communication skills and advanced organisational capabilities that are applicable to both private and public healthcare contexts.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
